rules.prepare:
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then NCURSESW_INCLUDE_DIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" else NCURSESW_INCLUDE_DIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/ncursesw" fi
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir -p curses && cd curses
"$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --includedir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --enable-echo \ --enable-const \ --enable-pc-files \ --enable-symlinks \ --disable-termcap \ --disable-rpath \ --disable-lp64 \ --with-default-terminfo-dir=/etc/terminfo \ --with-terminfo-dirs="/etc/terminfo:$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/terminfo:$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo" \ --with-pkg-config-libdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig" \ --with-ticlib=tic \ --with-termlib=tinfo \ --with-versioned-syms \ --with-xterm-kbs=del \ --with-abi-version=5 \ --with-shared \ --with-progs \ --with-chtype='long' \ --with-mmask-t='long' \ --without-profile \ --without-debug \ --without-ada \ --without-tests \ --disable-stripping
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir -p cursesw && cd cursesw
"$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --includedir="$NCURSESW_INCLUDE_DIR" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --enable-echo \ --enable-const \ --enable-pc-files \ --enable-symlinks \ --enable-widec \ --disable-termcap \ --disable-rpath \ --disable-lp64 \ --with-ncursesw \ --with-default-terminfo-dir=/etc/terminfo \ --with-terminfo-dirs="/etc/terminfo:$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/terminfo:$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo" \ --with-pkg-config-libdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig" \ --with-ticlib=tic \ --with-termlib=tinfo \ --with-versioned-syms \ --with-xterm-kbs=del \ --with-abi-version=5 \ --with-shared \ --with-progs \ --with-chtype='long' \ --with-mmask-t='long' \ --without-profile \ --without-debug \ --without-ada \ --without-tests \ --disable-stripping
rules.install:
BADTERMINFO="5/5250 f/fbterm i/iterm i/iterm-am i/iterm-color j/jfbterm k/kon k/kon2 l/linux-5250 s/stterm s/stterm-256color"
LIBTERMINFOFILES="a/ansi c/cons25 c/cons25-debian c/cygwin d/dumb h/hurd l/linux m/mach m/mach-bold m/mach-color m/mach-gnu m/mach-gnu-color p/pcansi r/rxvt r/rxvt-m r/rxvt-basic r/rxvt-unicode s/screen s/screen-bce s/screen-s s/screen-w s/sun v/vt100 v/vt102 v/vt220 v/vt52 x/xterm x/xterm-debian x/xterm-xfree86 x/xterm-color x/xterm-mono x/xterm-r5 x/xterm-r6 x/xterm-vt220 x/xterm-256color s/screen-256color s/screen-256color-bce w/wsvt25 w/wsvt25m E/Eterm E/Eterm-color"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/curses" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/cursesw" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
# Debian uses a linker script instead of a symlink. rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libtermcap.so" echo "GROUP( libtinfo.so )" > "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libtermcap.so" ln -sf libtinfo.a "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libtermcap.a"
# Always add -ltinfo when linking with -lncurses or -lnursesw rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libncurses.so" echo "INPUT(libncurses.so.5 -ltinfo)" > "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libncurses.so" rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libncursesw.so" echo "INPUT(libncursesw.so.5 -ltinfo)" > "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libncursesw.so"
# Move terminfo files to the right place. mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/terminfo" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo"
# Remove blacklisted terminal types and other stuff we don't install cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo" && rm -f $BADTERMINFO && cd -
# Move ncurses-base terminfo entries to /lib/terminfo. for f in $LIBTERMINFOFILES; do dir="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/terminfo/$(dirname $f)" mkdir -p "$dir" if [ -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo/$f" ]; then mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/terminfo/$f" "$dir" fi done
# Create an empty /etc/terminfo for the sysadmin. mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/terminfo"
# Symlinks libcurses.a and libcurses.so seem to be missing when prefix != /usr if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libcurses.a" ]; then ln -sf libncurses.a \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libcurses.a" fi if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libcurses.so" ]; then ln -sf libncurses.so \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libcurses.so" fi
# Build system ignores includedir directive when prefix != /usr if [ -d "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/ncurses" ]; then mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/ncurses/"* \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" rmdir "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/ncurses/" sed -i 's@ncurses/@@g' "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/"*.h fi
